description:
Satsuki and An use a makeshift drone to try some photography when they receive notice that the photography club will be dissolved due to the lack of members. Troubled by this news, they invite fellow classmate Sakurako Shikishima from the Cinema Club, which has also received a dissolution notice.
Meanwhile, Haruno is stuck on her manga draft when her high school friend, Kako Komada, pays her a visit. The two hit the road for a tour.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Making of Kuusatsu!! / Classmate Tazunete Sanzen Ri: Motovlog Part 12
Making of Some Aerial Photography! / Visiting a Classmate, 3000 Leagues - Motovlog Part 12
メイキング・オブ・空撮!! / クラスメイト訪ねて三千里 ~モトブログパート12~
